pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bootstrap Resampling for Mixed Effects and Plain Models // Performs bootstrap resampling for most models that update() works for. There are two main functions: BootGlmm() performs block resampling if random effects are present, and case resampling if not; BootCI() converts output from bootstrap model runs into confidence intervals and p-values. By default, BootGlmm() calls BootCI(). Package motivated by Humphrey and Swingley (2018) arXiv:1805.08670.
